KPIBag.QueryString: select equipmentName,(SELECT count(*) from tbl_historyevent B where A.EquipmentId=B.EquipmentId ) AS equipmentCount from tbl_equipment A

SELECT '水浸' AS EventName,COUNT(*) FROM TBL_HistoryEvent WHERE BaseTypeId like '1004005%' UNION SELECT '烟感' AS EventName,COUNT(*) FROM TBL_HistoryEvent WHERE BaseTypeId like '1004006%' UNION SELECT '门碰' AS EventName,COUNT(*) FROM TBL_HistoryEvent WHERE BaseTypeId like '1004007%' UNION SELECT '红外' AS EventName,COUNT(*) FROM TBL_HistoryEvent WHERE BaseTypeId like '1004008%';
KPIBag.Text: 门碰烟感水浸红外告警次数比较
KPIBag.Tag: ChartType=Pie&ChartTitle=门碰烟感水浸红外告警次数比较
